_header: Saint Luke us in his lesson says
_description: Gospel for the Sixteenth Sunday after Trinity in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: Saint luke vs in his lesson saisWhils ihesus crist welk in erthely ways…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …God len vs so in land to lifþat we oure gast to him may gif
BLHar4196.Note: receded by Latin, “Ibat ihesus crist in ciuitate naym.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: Dominica xvi estatis secundum Lucam (rubric, f. 123ra)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): III.131-138.
